messages.message: @Chetan <!here> is there a reason we updated scikit-image to 0.15 instead of 0.16?
you’ll have to check for Python 3.7 compat
not sure if scikit-image 0.15 is 3.7 compatible
oh gotcha — presumably 0.16 is 3.7 compatible as well
@Chetan and @lydia have the context on the library version though

anyway, the context is, for https://instabase.slack.com/archives/CGQ7BD72A/p1575929675098300, the issue is that 0.15 has a bug in the canny function. I tested, and the bug is fixed in 0.16, so it might be nice to upgrade

no particular reason @Jonathan Shih, no problems we know of with upgrading — i actually got the versions from your upgrade script (the upgrade script installed the correct version into a local dev environment, inside `tools/devtools/*`  @dlluncor, @lydia / I didn’t select them or modify from there).
